item.title: Dodgers force World Series to decisive Game 7 by holding off Blue Jays 3-1
item.description: Los Angeles kept alive its bid for a third title in six seasons.

item.title: Trump faces critical point in government shutdown, SNAP cutoff
item.description: Trump, back from a weeklong trip in Asia, will have to confront how to handle deepening impacts from the shutdown on Americans.

item.title: WATCH: JetBlue flight makes emergency landing after losing altitude
item.description: A JetBlue flight traveling from Mexico to New Jersey on Thursday made an emergency landing after experiencing a drop in altitude, leaving several pass...

item.title: What to know about the Senate filibuster as Trump calls on GOP to eliminate it
item.description: Senate Republicans are resisting his demand to end the long-standing filibuster rule in order to end the government shutdown.

item.title: WATCH: Devastating aftermath of Hurricane Melissa in Jamaica
item.description: Entire communities have been devastated or isolated after taking a direct hit form the powerful storm.
